document.full_text: the government of muammar gaddafi said nato strikes on tripoli tuesday killed 31 people, adding that western leaders were not seeking a peaceful solution but escalation.
document.title: libya says nato attacks on tripoli kill 31
lines_and_colors: the government of muammar gaddafi said nato strikes on tripoli tuesday killed 31 people, adding that western leaders were not seeking a peaceful solution but escalation.
